# windowFrameTextColor

**Type Property**

The color to use for text in a window’s frame.

## Declaration

```swift
class var windowFrameTextColor: NSColor { get }
```

## Return Value

The color used for text in window frames. For general information about system colors, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/SystemColors.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000790].

## Related Documentation

- **windowFrameColor**: The system color used for window frames, except for their text.

## Window colors

- **windowBackgroundColor**: The color to use for the window background.
- **underPageBackgroundColor**: The color to use in the area beneath your window’s views.
